评论概述: Stylish and fits a smaller face perfectly
评论详情: I always seem to have a hard time finding a pair of sun glasses that look nice on me. In my local stores and shops the shades are either too big, bulky, funny looking with weird shapes and designs to them. When I saw these and it mentioned they were for a smaller head I figured these might be the exact time of sun glasses I needed. When I tried them on for the first time I was like "yes" finally a pair that not only fit me well but looked good on me. Living in Florida you definitely need to have sun glasses year round. These did a good job blocking the rays from the intense sunshine here. They felt comfortable on my face and stayed put. I just love the green color and it is made from a sturdy plastic type material.
Really love these glasses. They are so cute and give such an attitude to your outfit. The green is gorgeous and is like a deep emerald color. They came with a very cute case which I love as well.

Perfect fit for my small face.  So many sunglasses are so big.  These are perfect.
Love these shades, wear them all the time and get lots of compliments. They fit my head and face perfectly and come with a cute case

评论概述: Actually doesn't look crazy on a tiny narrow head!
评论详情: I like these sunglasses! Can't go wrong with black on black. They seem sturdy, and most importantly, they don't project 3 inches on either side of my weird tiny head. I always struggle with finding a pair of sunglasses that proportionally looks right on my face, but then again perhaps my actual problem is with my face in general. anyway, very much looking forward to being not blinded by the sun this summer!
I have a small face and these fit perfectly. The only shades that don't look too oversized. The lenses are a good darkness too and they don't feel flimsy

I tried another brand in this style and it was too wide and stuck out too far from my face, then another but they were so small I was seeing the frame with them on. But these fit great and look super cute, so be sure to compare dimensions before you order. These fell right in the middle of the 2. They come with a soft case and cloth too. I got another color, may get one more. Great value and a must if you have a small face! Please make more colors and some with lighter lenses :D

I have such a hard time finding sunglasses that fit my small face, and these are great!  I was hesitant to order them because I couldn't try them on, but they fit perfect.  I like plastic frames so that I can put them up on my head without my hair getting stuck in them.  I was in desperate need for a pair for my upcoming trip to Mexico, and I am so happy that I took a chance on these.  I love the green frame and the lenses are nice and dark.  I wasn't expecting a case and a cleaning cloth for the price of these so that was a nice surprise.  I like the bright yellow.  They'll be easy to find in my beach bag or purse.  I'll be looking for more sunglasses from this company.

评论概述: Cute on and fit nicely, keep the sun glare at bay. Plastic feel
评论详情: The sunglasses come packaged nicely provided with a case and lens towel. They do a good job when the sunlight is at peak. They feel comfortable, are weighted nicely between the ears and bridge of the nose, but they have a plastic feel and sound as if you’re tapping against acrylic when handling the frame (think fingers nails touching the frame). I removed a star for that reason. Good for the price.

I was looking for a small lens/frame to replace a pair that I loved and lost 20 years ago. These are well packaged and come with a bright yellow case that make them easy to find. I would have preferred that the outermost edge had not been enlarged, but would have retained a more simple oval shape, so I took off one star. I'll be using these but remain on the lookout for that perfect replacement.

I have a smaller face, and often have difficulty with sunglasses not fitting my face.  However I am extremely sensitive to the sun, so it's a catch-22.  These sunglasses really are narrow, and fit well.  They also look really nice on.  My only hesitation is that they are narrow top to bottom as well, and a lot of the sun still gets in.  So they block some of the rays, but the sun still bothers me at the top.Overall, I still gave these a 3 star rating, they seem sturdy, are cute and come with a case and a lens cleaner, but they don't work for the intended purpose of blocking the sun's rays.

评论概述: No flaws that I can see << see what I did there?  ;-)
评论详情: These are well-made, oval-shaped sunglasses imported from China; they offer a touch more shade than the bulk of sunglasses you'll find in typical stores in the U.S. I wanted to try out the green sunglasses, which look almost black from the front except in certain light. I appreciate the cleaning cloth and the bright yellow case that were included; it's not a hard case, but it's probably sufficient protection when carrying the sunglasses in your purse, jacket or coat, or when storing them in the glove box of your car. The side embellishment adds a little pizzazz to these well-designed glasses. I look forward to seeing how these work over time.  The product description says these are good for "small face women" and I think that is correct. The product description itself needs some help with English as there are quite a few typos and incorrect word usage.

I was thrilled to find some sunglasses that don't cost me a fortune and fit my smaller sized face!  These glasses are well made and have good UV protection.  They come in one of the nicest cases I have seen in some time and include a cleaning cloth.  They certainly earn a 5-star rating from me!
